pkgmetadata.longdescription: Directed Weighted Clustering Coefficient // Allows the computation of clustering coefficients for directed and weighted networks by using different approaches. It allows to compute clustering coefficients that are not present in 'igraph' package. A description of clustering coefficients can be found in "Directed clustering in weighted networks: a new perspective", Clemente, G.P., Grassi, R. (2017), doi:10.1016/j.chaos.2017.12.007.
